page.title: 05Colvend: Education
page.content: There is one school in Colvend. We have ten pupils. Three of them live in Kippford,one in Southwick and the rest live in Colvend or Rockcliffe. The school was built in 1875. It has one classroom and a cloakroom.There are two toilets (outside!) for boys and two for girls. Six of us are boys and the rest are girls. We also have four gerbils as pets. We have a radio, a film projector,a television and a computer. Our teacher is Miss McDonald. We have a cleaner and a lady who comes in to serve the dinners. Dinners are sent from Castle Douglas,which is about 12 miles away.On Wednesdays we go to St. Peter's school in Dalbeattie for physical education. On Thursdays Mrs. Wallach,our music teacher comes.
